title: UTF-8Currency Symbols

metadata.description: Learn about UTF-8Currency Symbols with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Hex 20A0-20CF / Decimal 8352-8399 If you want any of these characters displayed in HTML, you can use the HTML entity found in the table below. If the character does not have an HTML entity, you can use the decimal (dec) or hexadecimal (hex) reference. Example

I will display €

I will display €

I will display €

summary: This tutorial covers UTF-8Currency Symbols concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use UTF-8Currency Symbols effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of UTF-8Currency Symbols and how to apply it in your projects.
